analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xecc3a47f5d0ac33db287d8f9debf03830853cbb9.sol:
	Contract RIKCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xecc3a47f5d0ac33db287d8f9debf03830853cbb9.sol#315-317)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
